backend/main.mo: Main canister actor managing categories, products, user profiles, purchases, and admin initialization/ownership claim logic with access control and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining data types and returning the previous actor state unchanged during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, page routes, and global providers like ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI component displaying an access denied message with optional custom text and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDiagn: Displays diagnostic status for auth, admin privileges, product fetch, and admin system initialization.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUploa: Provides contextual alerts explaining why admin product uploads may be unavailable and shows retry options.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFil: Button that triggers PDF file selection and passes the chosen file to a callback with loading support.
frontend/src/components/admin/SafeProduc: Error boundary wrapper around ProductFileUploadButton to show a safe fallback alert if it fails.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication controls, categories list, and admin-access-aware UI.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with copyright, developer tools modal trigger, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapping pages with a header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling auth via Internet Identity with loading states and mobile variant support.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product info with category icon, price, author, and link to product details.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting user to enter and save their name during profile setup.
frontend/src/components/RequestUpdateMod: Developer tool modal for update requests, retry commands, and generating deployment failure reports.
frontend/src/components/SearchAndFilterB: Search bar component for filtering products by title or author.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHero.t: Hero section with marketing text and image for the storefront landing page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls with React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, products, categories, and store state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a static informational About page describing the platform’s mission, collection, and values.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements the admin dashboard, handling product management, uploads, admin initialization, and access control.
frontend/src/pages/BuyerLibraryPage.tsx: Displays the user's purchased products and allows downloading files with authentication checks and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryStorefrontPag: Shows products within a specific category with search filtering, loading states, and profile setup prompts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact information and support categories with descriptive cards and guidance alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays product details, handles purchasing, and shows loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Lists all storefront products with search filtering, loading states, error handling, and optional profile setup.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentCommands.ts: Provides helper functions returning recommended deployment retry and diagnostic commands.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentFixSuggeste: Analyzes parsed deployment logs and returns fix suggestions based on common error patterns.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentLogParser.t: Parses raw deployment logs to determine the failing step and extract relevant error text using pattern matching.
frontend/src/utils/formatDeploymentRepor: Formats a structured deployment failure report combining parsed log details and suggested fixes into a readable text output.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and managing hash‑based routing values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata, known issues, and architectural notes describing current app behavior and outstanding deployment/UI problems.
